channel.title: Announcement on Noah Pitts
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on Noah Pitts

item.title: My First YouTube Video!
item.description: The Pop Out Link to heading I have been watching YouTube for my entire life. Studying, Laughing, Learning. I watch it more than TV. Today, I took another step in my content creation journey with by releasing my first video! It’s definetly me doing my best Super GT impression, but I’m proud of how it turned out. Click the picture below to check out the video! Behind the Scenes Link to heading I’ve been Sim Racing for over a year now.

item.title: HANDS ON KEYS
item.description: What is HANDS ON KEYS? Link to heading HANDS ON KEYS is a tech blog for developers. I’m hoping to provide as much value to developers as I possibly can, and will do so from a “hands on” perspective. This will also allow me to get more reps as a technical communicator, story teller, and developer! Current Status Link to heading I’m in the process now of brainstorming topics to write about.
